    • GiftCertificateService

      @Autowired public GiftCertificateService(GiftCertificateRepository giftCertificateRepository, TagRepository tagRepository)

  • Method Details

    • getAllGiftCertificates

      public List<GiftCertificate> getAllGiftCertificates(Integer page, Integer pageSize)
      Service layer method that return all got gift certificates, by calling a method of repository layer
      Parameters:
      page - page number to be viewed
      pageSize - number of objects that are going to be view in one page
      Returns:
      list of gift certificates got from repository

    • addNewGiftCertificate

      public GiftCertificate addNewGiftCertificate(@Valid @Valid GiftCertificate giftCertificate)
      Service layer method that add a new gift certificate, by calling a method of repository. Object have to pass validation to be added in DB
      Parameters:
      giftCertificate - object of Gift certificate that are going to be added in DB
      Returns:
      object that was added in DB

    • getSortedGiftCertificates

      public List<GiftCertificate> getSortedGiftCertificates(String direction, String sortingAttribute, Integer page, Integer pageSize)
      Controller GET method that return sorted gift certificates, by calling a method of repository layer.
      Parameters:
      direction - asc or desc value for defining sorting direction
      sortingAttribute - sorting attribute that mean field for sorting
      page - page number to be viewed (default value = 1)
      pageSize - number of objects that are going to be view in one page (default value = 10)
      Returns:
      list of sorted gift certificates got from repository

    • getSortedGiftCertificatesByNameAndCreateDate

      public List<GiftCertificate> getSortedGiftCertificatesByNameAndCreateDate(String nameDirection, String createDateDirection, Integer page, Integer pageSize)
      Service layer method that return sorted gift certificates, by calling a method of repository.
      Parameters:
      nameDirection - asc or desc value for name sorting attribute
      createDateDirection - asc or desc value for create date sorting attribute
      page - page number to be viewed
      pageSize - number of objects that are going to be view in one page
      Returns:
      list of sorted gift certificates got from repository

    • getGiftCertificatesByName

      public List<GiftCertificate> getGiftCertificatesByName(String name, Integer page, Integer pageSize)
      Service layer method that return gift certificates by part of name, by calling a method of repository.
      Parameters:
      name - name or part of name of gift certificate that we are going to find
      page - page number to be viewed
      pageSize - number of objects that are going to be view in one page
      Returns:
      list of sorted gift certificates got by name from repository
      See Also:
      • GiftCertificateRepository.findByPartOfName(String, Pageable)

    • getGiftCertificatesByDescription

      public List<GiftCertificate> getGiftCertificatesByDescription(String description, Integer page, Integer pageSize)
      Service layer method that return gift certificates by part of description, by calling a method of repository.
      Parameters:
      description - description or part of description of gift certificate that we are going to find
      page - page number to be viewed
      pageSize - number of objects that are going to be view in one page
      Returns:
      list of sorted gift certificates got by description from repository
      See Also:
      • GiftCertificateRepository.findByPartOfDescription(String, Pageable)

    • getGiftCertificateBySeveralTags

      public List<GiftCertificate> getGiftCertificateBySeveralTags(Set<String> tags, Integer page, Integer pageSize)
      Service layer method that return gift certificates by set of tags, by calling a method of repository.
      Parameters:
      tags - set of tags of gift certificates that we are going to find
      page - page number to be viewed
      pageSize - number of objects that are going to be view in one page
      Returns:
      list of gift certificates got by tags got from repository
      See Also:
      • GiftCertificateRepository.getGiftCertificateBySeveralTags(Set, Integer, Integer)

    • updateGiftCertificate

      public GiftCertificate updateGiftCertificate(Long id, @Valid @Valid GiftCertificate giftCertificate)
      Service layer method that updating a gift certificate by id, by calling a method of repository.
      Parameters:
      giftCertificate - object of Gift certificate that are going to be updated in DB
      id - an id of object that are going to be updated
      Returns:
      object that was updated in DB

    • updateGiftCertificateBySomeFields

      public GiftCertificate updateGiftCertificateBySomeFields(Long id, String name, String description, BigDecimal price, Integer duration)
      Service layer method that updating a gift certificate by id and also by some fields, by calling a method of repository.
      Parameters:
      id - an id of object that are going to be updated
      name - new name value for gift certificate
      description - new description value for gift certificate
      duration - new duration value for gift certificate
      price - new price value for gift certificate
      Returns:
      object that was updated in DB

    • deleteGiftCertificate

      public Long deleteGiftCertificate(Long id)
      Service layer method that delete a gift certificate by id, by calling a method of repository.
      Parameters:
      id - an id of object that are going to be deleted
